level.heading: Status of filings.
level.text: A filing under this chapter signed by a domestic entity shall become part of the public organic document of the entity if the entity's organic law provides that similar filings under that law become part of the public organic document of the entity.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Former ยง 29-201.05 has been recodified as ยง 29A-201.05.
